name: IKAS Teknoloji A.S.
description: Developer of multichannel retailing software designed to build the fastest e-commerce storefronts along with marketing abilities. The company's platform features inventory tracking and management, sales and order tracking, XML integration, bulk product loading, POS, and fast sales software, enabling retailers to manage their physical and online stores from a single application.
one_liner: Developer of multichannel retailing software designed to build the fastest e-commerce storefronts along with marketing abilities. The company's platform features inventory tracking and management, sales and order tracking, XML integration, bulk product loading, POS, and fast sales software, enabling retailers to manage their physical and online stores from a single application.
